name: Aztec eras
description:
I am a newbie in game development and created this game alone, I had a lot of ideas, but I did not have time. Please rate what is.

And if the plot, then I planned to create a settlement of the Aztecs, which the player had to save from 4 apocalypses. For each stage, the player is given 1 minute for which he must prepare for the event.
